metrics_format.success_rate: Percentage of epochs that resulted in a valid itinerary
metrics_format.timing_issues_per_itinerary: Mean number of timing issues per itinerary
metrics_format.fixed_issues_per_itinerary: Mean number of issues fixed per itinerary
metrics_format.fix_rate: Percentage of timing issues fixed per itinerary
metrics_format.total_segments: Total number of segments in all itineraries
metrics_format.total_timing_issues: Total number of timing issues across all itineraries
metrics_format.total_fixed_issues: Total number of issues fixed across all itineraries
